wikipedia_page.main: Lady Lettice Mildred Mary Ashley-Cooper OStJ (12 February 1911 – 24 November 1990) was a British aristocrat, socialite, and airwoman. One of the Bright Young Things of the 1920s, she became a Flight Officer of the Women's Auxiliary Air Force during World War II.

response: * Lady Lettice Mildred Ashley-Cooper (12 February 1911 – 1990) Flight Officer W.A.A.F ; European War 1939–45 (despatches).
* Lady Lettice Mildred Ashley-Cooper (12 February 1911 – 1990), Flight Officer, W.A.A.F.; European War 1939–45 (despatches)
